item.description: This is the first ‘interlude’ in my Effective Shell series. These interludes give some background, history or more flavour to some of the topics. Part 1: Navigating the Command Line Part 2: Become a Clipboard Gymnast Part 3: Getting Help Part 4: Moving Around Interlude: Understanding the Shell This one should be high-level enough for even non-technical readers to enjoy (or at least understand!). I've tried to make sure any term that might be unfamiliar is described in a footnote1.
